page.title: 13OUR SCHOOL DAY (cont)
page.content: When it is 10.30a.m. we go out to play. At the end of playtime a whistle is blown and we all gather around the teacher and then go into our class again. On the toilet block wall outside there are pictures of a jungle and a space scene painted by some parents. At twelve o'clock we eat our sandwiches as there is no kitchen which can give us a hot meal.In the afternoon we might go to our field, carrying our footballs, rounders' bats and posts. We sing in our classroom to a tape and play various instruments. We even paint in our room and wash up the brushes and palettes in the cloakroom amongst our coats. When we all go into the cloakroom to collect our coats and bags there's a dreadful squash.
